trans-unit.source: Implements the `RegisterAssembly` task.
trans-unit.target: 实现`RegisterAssembly`任务。

trans-unit.source: Use the `RegisterAssembly` element in your project file to create and execute this task.
trans-unit.target: 使用`RegisterAssembly`项目文件以创建和执行此任务中的元素。

trans-unit.source: For usage and parameter information, see [RegisterAssembly Task](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关用法和参数信息，请参阅[RegisterAssembly 任务](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Tasks.RegisterAssembly"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="Microsoft.Build.Tasks.RegisterAssembly"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the assemblies to be registered with COM.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置要向 COM 注册的程序集

trans-unit.source: The assemblies to be registered with COM.
trans-unit.target: 要向 COM 注册的程序集

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets information about the state between the `RegisterAssembly` task and the [UnregisterAssembly](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) task.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置之间的状态信息`RegisterAssembly`任务和[UnregisterAssembly](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)任务。

trans-unit.source: This prevents the `UnregisterAssembly` task from attempting to unregister an assembly that failed to register in the `RegisterAssembly` task.
trans-unit.target: 这可以防止`UnregisterAssembly`任务尝试注销无法在中注册程序集`RegisterAssembly`任务。

trans-unit.source: The state information necessary for the `UnregisterAssembly` task to do proper clean-up.
trans-unit.target: 所需的状态信息`UnregisterAssembly`任务执行适当的清理操作。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a Boolean value that specifies whether the task creates a codebase entry in the registry, which specifies the file path for an assembly that is not installed in the global assembly cache.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个布尔值，指定任务是否在注册表中，该项指定未在全局程序集缓存中安装的程序集的文件路径中创建 codebase 项。

trans-unit.source: You should not specify this option if you will subsequently install the assembly that you are registering into the global assembly cache.
trans-unit.target: 如果随后将你要注册的程序集安装到全局程序集缓存，不应指定此选项。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the task creates a codebase entry in the registry; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果任务在注册表; 中创建 codebase 项否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Executes the `RegisterAssembly` task.
trans-unit.target: 执行`RegisterAssembly`任务。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if task execution succeeded; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果任务成功执行;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Callback method for reporting the type library export events.
trans-unit.target: 回调方法，以报告类型库导出事件。

trans-unit.source: Describes the callbacks that the type library exporter makes when exporting a type library.
trans-unit.target: 描述类型库导出程序生成导出类型库时的回调。

trans-unit.source: The error code of the export event.
trans-unit.target: 导出事件的错误代码。

trans-unit.source: The message of the export event.
trans-unit.target: 导出事件消息。

trans-unit.source: Callback method for finding the type library for the specified assembly.
trans-unit.target: 回调方法，以查找指定程序集的类型库。

trans-unit.source: Logs an error indicating that the specified assembly is not registered for COM interop in all cases.
trans-unit.target: 记录错误，该值指示指定的程序集未注册为 COM 互操作在所有情况下。

trans-unit.source: The assembly to find type libraries for.
trans-unit.target: 要查找类型库的程序集。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> in all cases.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>在所有情况下。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the type library to generate from the specified assembly.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置要从指定的程序集生成类型库。

trans-unit.source: The generated type library contains definitions of the accessible types defined within the assembly.
trans-unit.target: 生成的类型库包含在程序集中定义的可访问类型的定义。

trans-unit.source: The type library is only generated if one of the following is true: - A type library of that name does not exist at that location.
trans-unit.target: 如果下列之一为 true，将仅生成类型库:-在该位置不存在该名称的类型库。

trans-unit.source: - A type library exists but it is older than the assembly being passed in.
trans-unit.target: -A 类型库存在，但它是早于正在传递的程序集。

trans-unit.source: If the type library is newer than the assembly being passed, a new one will not be created, but the assembly will still be registered.
trans-unit.target: 如果较新比所传递的程序集的类型库，将不会创建一个新，但仍注册程序集。

trans-unit.source: If this property is specified, it must have the same number of items as the <xref:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.RegisterAssembly.Assemblies%2A> property or the task will fail.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定此属性，它必须具有相同数量的项作为<xref:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.RegisterAssembly.Assemblies%2A>属性或任务将失败。</xref:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.RegisterAssembly.Assemblies%2A>

trans-unit.source: If no inputs are specified, the task will default to the name of the assembly and change the extension of the item to .tlb.
trans-unit.target: 如果未不指定任何输入，该任务将默认为程序集的名称，将项的扩展名更改为.tlb。

trans-unit.source: The type library to generate from the specified assembly.
trans-unit.target: 要从指定的程序集生成类型库。
